Edited December 5, 2014 by frey

Welcome to the forums!

Some players have had success with a triple monitor setup for KSP, but I believe only one in-game view at a time is possible in Unity. There is a mod that adds map mode on a second monitor, but uses the somewhat clumsy method of running two instances of KSP and keeping them synchronized.

I would love for KSP to have better multimonitor support (imagine having regular view, map mode, and IVA all visible simultaneously), but I'm not sure it's possible.

There's also Rich's Telemachus mod that allows you to spread telemetry data over as many monitors and browser windows as you like.

I wouldn't be sure as to whether stock multiple monitor support is totally impossible. However, it may be impractical.
